msg.spa: Hi @contact.prepiloto_nombre ,  in 2 days on the day of the @(DAY(contact.prepiloto_remnextapptdate3))  you have your second clinic visit. Be sure to ask them to measure your height and weight. These are important indicators of lifestyle so the doctor can make recommendations about diet and habits specific to you.
Again, after your visit we will ask you a couple of short questions about your visit. This information will be used to measure the quality of care and rate the doctors.
